snippet: The Cuban government announced that it was reimposing a travel permit requirement on many doctors and other health care workers, an attempt to counter a brain drain.
abstract: Cuba reimposes travel permit requirement on some doctors and other health care workers in attempt to stop large-scale migration of Cuban health professionals.
lead_paragraph: The Cuban government announced that it was reimposing a travel permit requirement on many doctors and other health care workers, an attempt to counter a brain drain.

headline.main: Cuba: Travel Controls Are Reinstated for Some Doctors
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Travel Controls Are Reinstated for Some Doctors
